= Feature Requests =

We're always looking for features, improvements. Let us know what you'd like to see us work on next by adding it to the list below.


== List of Features ==

Add your content here.  Format your content with:
  * Support for Google's [http://opensocialapis.blogspot.com/2008/07/use-ajax-libraries-api-to-speed-up.html hosted AJAX Libraries API] (to speed up OpenSocial apps)
  * Headings, paragraphs, and lists
  * Automatic links to other wiki pages
